description:
When Luna comes to visit, Alyssa and Viola help her learn to cook.  After eating some of Luna`s "cooking", Phoenix visits the doctor. The cast reimagines classic fairytales as only they could.
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: Noroware Majo no Oryouri Jijou / Kyouki no Fushichou no Shinsatsu Jijou / Dekoboko Douwa Gekijou
The Cooking Circumstances of the Cursed Witch / The Crazed Circumstances of the Phoenix`s Exam / Irregular Fairy Tale Theater
呪われ魔女のお料理事情 / 狂気の不死鳥の診察事情 / でこぼこ童話劇場
